text: Sursés (Romansh, ) is a valley region () and new municipality of the district Albula of the canton of Graubünden in Switzerland. On 1 January 2016, the former municipalities of Bivio, Cunter, Marmorera, Mulegns, Riom-Parsonz, Salouf, Savognin, Sur and Tinizong-Rona merged to form the new municipality of Surses. == References == == Other websites == * Official website of Surses (in Romansh), * * * * * * * * * * * * * Category:2016 establishments in Switzerland Category:Municipalities in Albula
title: Surses
